metadata.title: CVE-2018-1999023 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The Battle for Wesnoth Project version 1.7.0 through 1.14.3 contains a Code Injection vulnerability in the Lua scripting engine that can result in code execution outside the sandbox. This attack appear to be exploitable via Loading specially-crafted saved games, networked games, replays, and player content.

criterions.comment: wesnoth-1.14 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.14.4-1').
